front.title: IEEE Standard for Low-Rate Wireless Networks Amendment 6: Enabling Spectrum Resource Measurement Capability

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Definitions of MAC related functions to enable spectrum resource management are addressed in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.15.4â„¢. It specifies the following: - Spectrum resource measurements and network performance metrics, such as packet error ratio, delay, etc. - Information elements and data structures to capture these measurements, - Procedures for collecting and exchanging spectrum resource measurement information with higher layers or otherre devices.
